properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
"Set apart"
A chosen vessel
To the King of kings
"Set apart"
Forever severed
From all earthly things

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chosen vessels
Empty weak and small
Bearing heaven's
Greatest treasure
Christ the Lord of all
Christ the Lord of all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
"Set apart"
To bear the fragrance
Of His blessed Name
And with Him
To share the sufferings
Of a cross of shame

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
"Set apart"
With Him to suffer
O'er a world undone
And to stand
In fiercest conflict
Till the fight be won

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
"Set apart"
An earthern vessel
Empty weak and small
Yet the treasure
That it beareth
Christ the Lord of all
